name: the_right_song_now.mp3
description:
(There are several songs included, so it takes a second to load.)

Controls: arrows to move the cursor, enter/space to click icons

It's 2007, you're 16-years-old and you just revamped your profile page. Now all you need is the right song. Songs and Sources
Dare 2 B Stupid by Weird Al

Foxtrot Uniform Charlie Kilo by Bloodhound Gang
Stacy's Mom by Fountains of Wayne
A Cruel Angel's Thesis from Evangelion
Hey There Delilah by Plain White T's
Bring Me to Life by Evanescence
I Write Sings Not Tragedies by Panic! At the Disco
Dirty Little Secret by The All-American Rejects
Grand Theft Autumn by Fall Out Boy
Everything is Alright by Motion City Soundtrack

And the following songs are all from here:
I Hate Everything About You by Three Days Grace
Where is My Mind by The Pixies
Scar Tissue by Red Hot Chili Peppers
The Star Wars Theme by John Williams
Girl at the Rock Show by Blink 182
Mama Mia by Abba (though the musical, in spirit)
Bad by Michael Jackson
Emergency by Paramore
The Harry Potter Theme by John Williams
New Slang by The Shins
Killing in the Name by Rage Against The Machine
Teen Spirit by Nirvana
Another One Bites the Dust by Queen
